m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      News:Archive:2008:March From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search PESWiki News -- March 2008 Archive Click here for current news page 2008 April Click here for April, 2008 news archive March March 31, 2008 Events > ExtraOrdinary Technology Conference 2008 in Albuquerque - July 31-Aug 3 conference will cover such topics as Tesla Technology • Magnetic Motors • Zero-Point Energy • Energy Saving Devices • Cosmic/Radiant Energy • Brown's Gas • Low Temperature Plasma • GEET • ElectroGravit
